questions: Q. 1. Is the friction same for all the surfaces ?
answers: Ans. No, it is not same for all the surfaces.

questions: Q. 1. Which surface produces more friction ?
answers: Ans. Rough surfaces produce more friction.

questions: Q. 1. Which surface produces less friction ?
answers: Ans. Smooth surfaces produce less friction.

questions: Q. 1. What is the direction of frictional force ?
answers: Ans. Its direction is always opposite to the direction of motion.

questions: Q. 5. Which is less sliding friction or static friction ?
answers: Ans. Matchstick catches fire due to friction.
